channel.title: Se7en-PS |OsRS| Daily Updates |Economy|
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/UQ2R6xl.png[/img] Today I'm presenting to y'all a new server that might just be Old School RS that the community knows, and loves. The Developers of Se7en have put a great deal of time & dedication to making this for the community. We're just beginning, so there are bound to be small bugs that still need squashed, but thanks to a dedicated staff team they are quickly dealt with. At Se7en, satisfaction of the community is our top priority. Delivering hours of fun, entertainment, and a few good friends along the way. So what are you waiting for? [B][U]Se7en-PS[/U][/B] Join now, and make sure to tell us you're from Rune-Server!
[URL=http://"http://se7en-ps.com/"][img]http://i.imgur.com/4GJ9lwA.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"http://se7en-ps.com/forums"][img]http://i.imgur.com/AOoC7a3.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/pheps8tepy40cnl/Se7en.jar?dl=0"][img]http://i.imgur.com/iKY6xSV.png[/img][/URL]
[SPOILER=Media] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LRU67Ap.png[/img] Where the Adventure Starts
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Nkd9asR.png[/img] Baby Blue Combat
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TwDMpPJ.png[/img] Slayer & Quest Tab
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PW11h4x.png[/img] Sea Snake(Temporary Location)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gwUNWUH.png[/img] Online Players
[img]http://i.imgur.com/yzMhuWV.png[/img] Se7en's Home Area
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CAfQ6QO.png[/img] Npc Focused Stat
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vOKZhZM.png[/img] Multi Corporeal Beast
[img]http://i.imgur.com/58syPEJ.png[/img] PvP In Safe Portal
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Kmcl0Cx.png[/img] Task & Achievements
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GGqMRgo.png[/img] Duo Slayer
[img]http://i.imgur.com/XbR7wEZ.png[/img] Duo Slayer Task Completion
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Update Log] [CODE]Update 1.0
[B]I[/B]:-Jad wasn't dropping a firecape, and none of you probably noticed this but he also didn't have good movement coordination. This was fixed -Prices have been adjusted to match OldSchool RuneScape's recent revision -Zaff's shop was updated and now offers players the Ancient Staff -The pet system was looked at, there were two problems that were created by character-saving. When you log out and log back in your pet wasn't there *(This wasn't for all of them). Some of the pets would multiply as you pick them up, this was also fixed immediately in Update 1. -Iron Man mode is in beta, Ultimate Iron Man mode will be added once more has been done with regular Iron Man mode -Then there's everyone's favorite, due to a complication with the economy the server was reset and set at a newly and updated version of the game. Although this is a miniature update, we expect satisfactory out of the updates due to your request and completion in such a short matter of time.
[B]II[/B]: Apart from Update 1, here are the following updates for the soon to be Update 1.1:
- Added Chat Logs, handled in Data and PlayerAssistant (Srv Sided) (11:48 AM, 11/14/15) - Reconfigured teleports, they had text under them that was inaccurate. (11:33 AM 11/15/15) - Drops for Wyverns were messing up, looked into it, removed comments from the method placed (11:12 AM 11/15/15) - Duel Arena enabled and staking fixed, methods rewrote. (11/15/15) - Rewrote Fishing (11/15/15) - Completely rewrote Mining, tick and CycleEvents weren't functional -- now are. (5:39 AM 11/16/15) - Corporeal Beast added to the game. (3:00 PM 11/17/15) - Started on a different trade interface (6:09 PM 11/17/15) - Successfully added CheckInv and Checkbank commands, moderator rights privileged. (4:26 AM 11/18/15) - Added 100% Tradelogs (4:39 AM 11/18/15)[/CODE] [/SPOILER]
[FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=1]Feedback is appreciated, please thank the post if you enjoyed the content or are going to check us out! Credits: [B]Bear[/B] [B]Justin[/B] [B]LifeIsGifted(Life)[/B] [/CENTER]

item.title: Se7en-PS |OsRS| Daily Updates |Economy|
item.dc:creator: @jbennett2447 jbennett2447
item.description:
@jbennett2447 wrote:

[CENTER]
Today I’m presenting to y’all a new server that might just be Old School RS that the community knows, and loves. The Developers of Se7en have put a great deal of time & dedication to making this for the community. We’re just beginning, so there are bound to be small bugs that still need squashed, but thanks to a dedicated staff team they are quickly dealt with. At Se7en, satisfaction of the community is our top priority. Delivering hours of fun, entertainment, and a few good friends along the way. So what are you waiting for?
Se7en-PS
Join now, and make sure to tell us you’re from Rune-Server!

[SPOILER=Media]

LRU67Ap.png764×552

Where the Adventure Starts

Nkd9asR.png764×552

Baby Blue Combat

TwDMpPJ.png764×553

Slayer & Quest Tab

PW11h4x.png764×552

Sea Snake(Temporary Location)

gwUNWUH.png764×553

Online Players

yzMhuWV.png764×554

Se7en’s Home Area

CAfQ6QO.png764×552

Npc Focused Stat

vOKZhZM.png764×552

Multi Corporeal Beast

58syPEJ.png764×552

PvP In Safe Portal

Kmcl0Cx.png764×551

Task & Achievements

GGqMRgo.png764×551

Duo Slayer

XbR7wEZ.png764×551

Duo Slayer Task Completion

[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Update Log]

[CODE]Update 1.0

I:-Jad wasn’t dropping a firecape, and none of you probably noticed this but he also didn’t have good movement coordination. This was fixed
-Prices have been adjusted to match OldSchool RuneScape’s recent revision
-Zaff’s shop was updated and now offers players the Ancient Staff
-The pet system was looked at, there were two problems that were created by character-saving. When you log out and log back in your pet wasn’t there *(This wasn’t for all of them). Some of the pets would multiply as you pick them up, this was also fixed immediately in Update 1.
-Iron Man mode is in beta, Ultimate Iron Man mode will be added once more has been done with regular Iron Man mode
-Then there’s everyone’s favorite, due to a complication with the economy the server was reset and set at a newly and updated version of the game. Although this is a miniature update, we expect satisfactory out of the updates due to your request and completion in such a short matter of time.

II: Apart from Update 1, here are the following updates for the soon to be Update 1.1:

  • Added Chat Logs, handled in Data and PlayerAssistant (Srv Sided) (11:48 AM, 11/14/15)
  • Reconfigured teleports, they had text under them that was inaccurate. (11:33 AM 11/15/15)
  • Drops for Wyverns were messing up, looked into it, removed comments from the method placed (11:12 AM 11/15/15)
  • Duel Arena enabled and staking fixed, methods rewrote. (11/15/15)
  • Rewrote Fishing (11/15/15)
  • Completely rewrote Mining, tick and CycleEvents weren’t functional – now are. (5:39 AM 11/16/15)
  • Corporeal Beast added to the game. (3:00 PM 11/17/15)
  • Started on a different trade interface (6:09 PM 11/17/15)
  • Successfully added CheckInv and Checkbank commands, moderator rights privileged. (4:26 AM 11/18/15)
  • Added 100% Tradelogs (4:39 AM 11/18/15)[/CODE]
    [/SPOILER]

[FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=1]Feedback is appreciated, please thank the post if you enjoyed the content or are going to check us out!
Credits:
Bear
Justin
LifeIsGifted(Life)
[/CENTER]
